column1: RoC RETINOL CORREXION MAX Daily Hydration Anti-Wrinkle Creme is my new favorite skincare. I have been using it for several weeks and my skin is now much smoother and brighter. I have noticed some wrinkles are less noticeable. The only drawback is I have to use sunscreen during the day since this product contains retinol, otherwise my skin will get burnt easily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Since using this product for 3 weeks now I have noticed a significant difference in how soft and supple my skin has become. My husband even commented on how much firmer my skin looked and the difference in the deep wrinkles I had on my forehead, around my eyes and nose and mouth! I will continue using this product and get rid of all the other hydration and anti wrinkle I have been using!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It made my face feel so refreshed and soft. I was looking for a product that will work on my bags under my eyes and wrinkles. I also wanted to get rid of fine lines and this product takes care of all those problems. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

RoC RETINOL CORREXION MAX Daily Hydration Anti-Wrinkle Creme Is amazing. I love how hydrating and effective this cream is to make my face look younger and appear more radiant. The cream absorbs perfectly and it diminished my fine lines and wrinkles. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
RoC Retinol Correxion Max Daily Hydration Anti-Wrinkle Creme is Wonderful. Feel Great on your face, I love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I recently turned 40 and I'm getying pesky fine lines and wrinkles! RoC Retinol Correxion Max works amazing! Absorbs well, not greasy or sticky. My fine lines and wrinkles are diminishing! Works well under makeup too! I have sensitive skin and this stuff does not irritate my skin or redness! Instead it helps reverse the signs of aging! It's like a fountain of youth in a bottle thats affordable! A little goes a long way!
Applies well. Does not leave your face feeling sticky. Absorbs quickly. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

As soon as I used it, my skin felt 10x better and more hydrated. I will definitely ne purchasing this again. I have tried many and I'm pretty happy with RoC. Recommended indeed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I thought it was a good creme and kept my face dry. It also reduced the wrinkles in my face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love the way it made my skin feel. It was sort and smooth and didn't leave it oily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This is one of the few that actually works. I've used everything, even those costing $150 a jar. This is better. Serious. I use it daily. Can see a big difference in my face.

I really liked how quickly the product started to show results. It's only been a couple of weeks but I can't wait to see if it keeps working and improves or if this is as good as it gets. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this two months. I really like it my skin feels healthier and i think looks somehwat better. It will not take away the wrinkles. Prob only botox will do that. They do look a little diminshed. Wish it did take them away!
I see no notice difference . I have excellent skin, very few wrinkles. I just wanted to try a different cream to change from my regular Clinique moisturizer.
Was able to get my hands on this from a family member, this product is incredible! I really felt a difference in my complexion in only a few days. Would definitely recommend!

After a week of daily usage, my skin started to dry and get flaky. After I exfoliated, I noticed that my skin was tighter and looked smoother. There is a little bit of a sting from sensitivity which goes away after a few minutes. I could definitely see a difference in my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The RoC Retinol Correxion MAX daily hydration Anti-Wrinkly Cr√®me goes on smooth and absorbs quickly. It feels light on my skin. It leaves my face feeling soft and hydrated. I love that it is Fragrance Free. Great product that I will definitely purchase in the future! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

All I can say is wow. I have been using the cream for about 2 weeks now and my skin is soooo soft. Even my husband said how soft my face is. No redness or burning as I thought might happen after reading about it. I apply once a day and it worked. I will try more Roc products now. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like the Roc Retinol Correxion Anti-wrinkle cream, I like that it is fragrance free and how smooth it feels on your skin. I like that it doesn't leave an oily film on my face after I use it and after rubbing it in, it dries really fast. I don't even know I have it on. I can see a little difference in the wrinkle around my eyes, but they are not all gone. Hopefully after using it longer, there will be even less. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am seeing some improvement on my forehead so far it has been great at keeping my face hydrated, very Rich cream has both retinol & hyaluronic acid , absorbing well . I used at night & daytime moisture, this cream makes my skin look & feel soft and smooth glowing. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was pretty impressed with this cream,it helped my face look more hydrated and not dry like it usually is. I also noticed how healthier my skin looks after using this for just a couple weeks. Although I don't have a "wrinkle problem" I would still use this for overall better looking and feeling skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love using this Roc retinol correction cream on my face and my neck at night time, really light weight, really smooth, glides on your skin without leaving a greasy or oily feeling. I've been having some wrinkles pop up along my eyes, mouth and neck area, so I am making sure to use this retinol correction anti-wrinkle cream every single night which isn't hard to remember to do because I can definitely see improvements already. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I thought that the RoC Retinol Correxion Max Daily Hydration Anti-Wrinkly Creme, Fragrance-Free worked well. I saw noticeable improvement for my fine lines and wrinkles. I didn't like that I needed to wear an extra SPF 15 or higher. It made me concerned about the overall health of my skin using just the product alone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product was amazing from the start! I carefully read the package directions, and tried the creme. I thought it would make my skin break out, but it didn't. Our weather has been perfect for testing because of very low humidity. My face and neck are so moisturized, and the fine lines are disappearing. The label says that in time, the deeper lines will be less noticeable, and I can't wait! Amazing product, RoC! I'm a fan! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
